original_text: Please help Zenas, the lawyer, and Apollos as much as you can. Make sure that they have everything that they need for their journey.
korean_text: 율법교사 세나와 및 아볼로를 급히 먼저 보내어 그들로 부족함이 없게 하고

sentences.original_text: Please help Zenas, the lawyer, and Apollos
Make sure that they have everything
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 것을 가지고 있는지 확인하세요

sentences.original_text: that they need for their journey
